TopicTitle: New to the forums, looking forward to discussions

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys, Girls,

this is my first posting here on the KSP Forums. I'm more excited about KSP than I've been about any other games in recent years. Even though I've played it for over 400 hours already, I'm still looking forword to new challenges. And I even bought / built a new computer for it. I love it as much as I loved to play Lego as a child. I'm fascinated, as a Computer Science student, by the modular system that KSP uses and believe that this approach (by modularizing functionality and allowing users to create their own complex systems) could be used in many others areas as well. And I'd like to expand my professional knowledge in this area. The possibilities for KSP seem endless. And while most of my and our ideas might remain daydreams, I like to at least send out some suggestions. But I'm going to split these suggestions into individual threads. I will link these threads here.

greetings from a guy from Austria/Salzburg, living in Karlsruhe/Germany at the moment

Lukas
Velkommen, Infosoph! May your travels be full of excitement! These forums are a wonderful place to socialize with other like-minded folks.
